text: Abu Abdullah Ja'far ibn al-Aswad ibn al-Haytham was an Isma'ili da'i born in 268 AH (881/2 CE) in Qayrawan. He is the author of Kitāb al-Munāẓarāt ("The Book of discussions"). == References == Category:Ismaili da'is Category:880s births Category:People from Kairouan Category:10th-century people of the Fatimid Caliphate Category:Ismaili theologians
title: Abu Abdullah Ja'far ibn al-Aswad ibn al-Haytham
